input: num (integer whose digits will be summed)
output: integer representing the sum of all digits in the input number

steps.step: Create a temporary copy of the input number
Process each digit using modular arithmetic

substeps.step: While the temporary number is not 0:
Extract the rightmost digit using modulo operation: $digit = tmpnum \bmod 10$
Add the extracted digit to the running sum
Remove the rightmost digit using integer division: $tmpnum = \lfloor tmpnum / 10 \rfloor$

output: formatted display of the original number and its digit sum

steps.step: Calculate digit sum by calling SumOfDigits algorithm
Display formatted result showing the original number and the sum of its digits
